title: application vulnerabilities
extract: An application vulnerability is a system flaw or weakness in an application that could be exploited to compromise the security of the application. ... These crimes target the confidentiality, integrity, or availability (known as the “CIA triad”) of resources possessed by an application, its creators, and its users.
extract_html: An application vulnerability is a system flaw or weakness in an application that could be exploited to compromise the security of the application. ... These crimes target the confidentiality, integrity, or availability (known as the “CIA triad”) of resources possessed by an application, its creators, and its users.
